rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall that follows Vastu principles by aligning with auspicious directions, with natural ventilation.
spacious living room placed in the southeast quadrant for positive energy flow. The interior design includes sustainable furniture and energy-efficient windows.
Dining area adjacent to the living room, designed with a view towards nature for a calming dining experience. It adheres to Vastu by using natural textures.
Compact kitchen designed in the northeast quadrant for prosperity, equipped with energy-efficient appliances and water-saving fixtures. The layout minimizes heat.
A master bedroom located in the north quadrant to ensure calm and balanced energy, featuring sound insulation and eco-friendly materials.
Second bedroom placed in a strategic location to balance the energy flow. Uses sustainable wood finishes and low VOC paints.
Third bedroom designed with a focus on simplicity, utilizing local resources to reduce cost while ensuring energy efficiency.
Fourth bedroom integrated into the floor plan for additional space, adhering to Vastu guidelines by aligning with family prosperity zones.
Primary bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, designed with water-saving fixtures and eco-friendly materials.
Additional bathroom for common use, ensuring privacy and comfort while maintaining a sustainable approach.
A compact private gym space designed in the northwest quadrant for balanced energy, featuring natural light and ventilation, with minimalistic yet functional design.
A utility room placed strategically to serve both kitchen and laundry areas, designed with eco-friendly materials and energy-saving fixtures.

openings.description: North-facing entrance door that follows Vastu principles for auspicious entry, ensuring natural ventilation and light.
Strategically placed windows in east and south to maximize daylight while maintaining privacy and energy efficiency.
West-facing balcony providing outdoor access, designed for relaxation with eco-friendly railing materials.
